typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PROD_ID as integer,
		CATEGORY_ID as integer,
		TITLE as string,
		ACTOR as string,
		PRICE as string,
		SPECIAL as integer,
		COMMON_PROD_ID as integer,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE as date,
		ROW_UPDATED_DATE as date,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY as integer,
		ROW_UPDATED_BY as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Products
source(output(
		CATEGORY_ID as integer,
		CATEGORY_NAME as string,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE as date,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> categories
source(output(
		PROD_ID as integer,
		QUAN_IN_STOCK as integer,
		SALES as integer,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE as date,
		ROW_UPDATED_DATE as date,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY as integer,
		ROW_UPDATED_BY as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Inventory
Products, select3 join(Products@CATEGORY_ID == select3@CATEGORY_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
select5, select4 join(select5@PROD_ID == select4@PROD_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
categories select(mapColumn(
		CATEGORY_ID,
		CATEGORY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
Inventory select(mapColumn(
		PROD_ID,
		QUAN_IN_STOCK,
		SALES
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select4
join1 select(mapColumn(
		PROD_ID,
		CATEGORY_ID = Products@CATEGORY_ID,
		TITLE,
		ACTOR,
		PRICE,
		SPECIAL,
		COMMON_PROD_ID,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE,
		ROW_UPDATED_DATE,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY,
		ROW_UPDATED_BY,
		CATEGORY_ID = select3@CATEGORY_ID,
		CATEGORY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select5
join2 select(mapColumn(
		PROD_ID = select5@PROD_ID,
		CATEGORY_ID,
		TITLE,
		ACTOR,
		PRICE,
		SPECIAL,
		COMMON_PROD_ID,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE,
		ROW_UPDATED_DATE,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY,
		ROW_UPDATED_BY,
		CATEGORY_NAME,
		QUAN_IN_STOCK,
		SALES
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select6
select6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		S_KEY as integer,
		PRODUCT_ID as integer,
		CATEGORY_ID as integer,
		CATEGORY_NAME as string,
		TITLE as string,
		ACTOR as string,
		PRICE as string,
		SPECIAL as integer,
		COMMON_PROD_ID as integer,
		QUAN_IN_STOCK as integer,
		SALES as integer,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE as date,
		ROW_UPDATED_DATE as date,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY as integer,
		ROW_UPDATED_BY as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PRODUCT_ID = PROD_ID,
		CATEGORY_ID,
		CATEGORY_NAME,
		TITLE,
		ACTOR,
		PRICE,
		SPECIAL,
		COMMON_PROD_ID,
		QUAN_IN_STOCK,
		SALES,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE,
		ROW_UPDATED_DATE,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY,
		ROW_UPDATED_BY
	)) ~> sink1
